item.description: .top-bg{ background-image: url("/img/cities/beijing/bg-down.png"); background-size: cover; width: 99vw; height: 500px; position: absolute; left: 0; top: 0; z-index: -100; } .page { height: 600px; width: 1000px; margin: 20px auto; /* background-color: antiquewhite; */ } .intro { display: flex; flex-direction: row; } .intro .cityname { margin-top: 200px; font-size: 100px; } .page1 { display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: stretch; } .page1 .upper{ margin-top: 100px; text-align: center; } .page1 .down { display: flex; flex-direction: row; justify-content: space-around; } .

.container{ background-color: aqua; height: 800px; } .container .turntable{ background-image: url("/img/destination/turntable.jpg"); background-size: cover; position: fixed; right: 0; transform: translateX(50%) translateY(calc(50vh - (50%))); width: 60vh; height: 60vh; transition: 1s ease; } .container .display { position: fixed; right: 0; width: 15vh; height: 15vh; background-color: bisque; transform: translateX(20vh) translateY(calc(50vh - (50%))); cursor: pointer; transition: transform 1s ease, visible 0s ease; visibility: hidden; } .container .middle{ transform: translateX(-30vh) translateY(calc(50vh - (50%))); visibility: visible; } .

.hole-page { background-color: white; width: 100%; } .our-service { background-color: antiquewhite; height: 600px; display: flex; flex-direction: row; justify-content: space-around; } .our-service .left { width: 48%; } .our-service .right { width: 48%; } .our-service .left h1 { color: orange; font-size: 100px; margin: auto; } .our-service .left h2 { color: aqua; font-size: 60px; font-weight: 700; margin: auto; } .our-service .left h3 { color: aqua; font-size: 40px; } .guider { height: 600px; margin-top: 40px; background-color: azure; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: stretch; } .

item.title: Contact
item.description: To contact us, please fill out the form below.
